Meat Shake.name: Meat Shake
Meat Shake.desc: Increases Damage Reduction by 8%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one concoction may be active at a time.

Mudtooth's Tonic.name: Mudtooth's Tonic
Mudtooth's Tonic.desc: Increases Max Health by 25. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Mudtooth's Stew.name: Mudtooth's Stew
Mudtooth's Stew.desc: Increases Max Stamina by 25, Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Verdant Tea.name: Verdant Tea
Verdant Tea.desc: Increases Stamina Recovery by 20 per second and reduces Stamina Regen Penalty by 50%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Dark Cider.name: Dark Cider
Dark Cider.desc: Increases Health by 6.66%, Stamina by 6.66%, and Movement Speed by 6.66%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Bark Extract.name: Bark Extract
Bark Extract.desc: Increases Armor by 30. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Strong Drink.name: Strong Drink
Strong Drink.desc: Reduces Encumbrance by 10. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Root Water.name: Root Water
Root Water.desc: Regenerates 0.75 Health per second. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Sacred Lakewater.name: Sacred Lakewater
Sacred Lakewater.desc: Increases Grey Health Conversion by 50% and Grey Health Regen by 1 per secorid. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Sanguine Vapor.name: Sanguine Vapor
Sanguine Vapor.desc: Increases Ranged and Melee Lifesteal by 3.5% of base damage. Increases damage taken by 10%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Bottled Shaedberry.name: Bottled Shaedberry
Bottled Shaedberry.desc: Increases Mod Power Generation by 10%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Chilled Steam.name: Chilled Steam
Chilled Steam.desc: Increases Movement Speed by 10%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Dark Fluid.name: Dark Fluid
Dark Fluid.desc: Increases Distance of Evade and Combat Slide by 15% and reduces the cost by 20%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Tranquility Font.name: Tranquility Font
Tranquility Font.desc: Reduces Reticle Sway, Spread, and Gun Recoil by 25%. Lasts 60m and will stay ineffect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Xenoplasm.name: Xenoplasm
Xenoplasm.desc: Reduces Skill Cooldowns by 10%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.

Mudtooth's Elixir.name: Mudtooth's Elixir
Mudtooth's Elixir.desc: Increases Experience Gains by 15%. Lasts 60m and will stay in effect after death. Only one Concoction may be active at a time.
